original_text: Consider the lilies how they grow: they toil not, they spin not; and yet I say unto you, that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.
korean_text: 백합화를 생각하여 보라 실도 만들지 않고 짜지도 아니하느니라 그러나 내가 너희에게 말하노니 솔로몬의 모든 영광으로도 입은 것이 이 꽃 하나만큼 훌륭하지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Consider the lilies how they grow
and yet I say unto you
that Solomon in all his glory
was not arrayed like one of these
sentences.korean_translation: 이 꽃 중 하나처럼 입지 못하였느니라
